aboutPage.title: About CVPlus
aboutPage.subtitle: An open-source project dedicated to transforming how professionals present themselves

creator.title: Created by Gil Klainert
creator.description1: Hi! I'm Gil Klainert, a Software Engineering Leader and AI Expert passionate about leveraging technology to solve real-world problems. I created CVPlus as an open-source gift to the community, believing that everyone deserves access to powerful tools that can help them advance their careers.
creator.description2: This project combines my expertise in AI, web development, and user experience design to create something that makes a real difference in people's professional lives.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: CVPlus was born from a simple belief: your professional story deserves to be told in the most compelling way possible. We're here to democratize access to AI-powered career tools, making them free and accessible to everyone, regardless of their background or financial situation.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Released under the MIT License, CVPlus is free to use, modify, and distribute. We believe in the power of community-driven development.

aiPowered.title: AI-Powered
aiPowered.description: Leveraging Claude AI's advanced capabilities to understand, analyze, and enhance your professional profile with intelligent insights.

innovation.title: Innovation First
innovation.description: Constantly pushing boundaries with features like AI career podcasts, interactive timelines, and dynamic QR codes that bring CVs to life.

community.title: Community Driven
community.description: Built for the community, by the community. We welcome contributions, feedback, and ideas from users worldwide.

contributing.title: Want to Contribute?
contributing.description: CVPlus is open to contributions! Whether you're a developer, designer, or just someone with great ideas, we'd love to have you join our mission to revolutionize how people present their professional stories.

cta.description: Start your career transformation journey today
